article: Do you think of your parents? "Yes, of course." You may answer, I buy a present for my mother on  Mother's Day  .And I give my father a present on Father's Day,  _  ." Then what about the other days of a year? Always  _  to think of your parents, not just on some important days. I have a friend who  _  alone, because her parents live in another city. One day l went to see her. We had a nice chat. Then she wanted to make a  _  .She dialed the number, but then she put the phone  _  . After about ten seconds, she dialed the number again. "Hi, Mum..." Later I asked, "Why did you dial the number  twice  ?"she smiled, "My parents are old. They can not get close to the telephone  _  .I always do so when I call them. I just want to give them  enough  time to answer the call." My friend is a good girl. She is always  thinking about  her parents. You also want to be a good child, right? So why not learn from her?
